mention.text: 23 jun 89 -- concerning the terrorist attack on friday
23 jun 89 -- concerning the terrorist attack on friday , 23 june at the san salvador central market in which 2 people were killed and 30 wounded , the fmln
a terrorist action by the arena government
the hurling of the bomb at the central market
part of a cold-blooded plan that consists of criminal actions in public places designed to turn people against the fmln
